department.ch: 人力資源管理研究所碩士班

goal.en: Personnel Economics provides a rigorous framework for understanding organizational design and the management of employees. Economics has proven to be a powerful approach in the changing study of organizations and human resources by adding rigor and structure and clarifying many important issues.
goal.ch: 「人力資源經濟學」或「人事管理經濟學」(Personnel Economics)是從資源分配與誘因設計的經濟學核心課題出發，運用經濟學的方式來分析人力資源管理所關心的問題，尋找人力資源管理的基本經濟原則。一般經濟學者認為，人力資源管理關心許多企業人資的問題，但缺乏系統性的理論與實證基礎，其答案通常較含糊，較難提供人資經理人明確的法則與策略。Personnel Economics的發展，結合人力資源與勞動經濟學，運用嚴謹的經濟理論與計量工具，嘗試解決人力資源政策上各個層面彼此間的複雜關係，可以確實分析各種人力資源政策的成因與後果、瞭解誘發員工努力因素，以及一個組織成功與失敗的因素，提供人力資源管理另一個層面的研究方向。本課程將以Lazear ＆ Gibbs (2014)之Personnel Economics in Practice (3rd Edition)與Kuhn (2018)之Personnel Economics二書為主軸，輔以相關學術觀點。課程的進行將著重在如何運用經濟分析對人力資源管理的課題提供論證方法與答案。

content.en:
This course is based on “Personnel Economics in Practice“ by Lazear and Gibbs (2014) and “Personnel Economics“ by Kuhn (2018) and will be complemented by selected journal articles. Selected topics in this course include:
(1) Setting hiring standards
(2) Recruitment and screening
(3) Investments in skills and training
(4) Managing turnover
(5) Performance evaluation
(6) Rewarding performance
(7) Career-based incentives
(8) Options and Executive Pay
(9) Entrepreneurship and Intrapreneurship
(10) The Employment Relationship
